prompt: Find the elven scout near the edge of the forest and deliver the moonstone pendant.
Help the old apothecary gather three glowing mushrooms from the fairy glade.
Challenge the goblin trickster to a riddle contest behind the ale tent.
Retrieve the lost banner from the top of the watchtower and return it to the knight commander.
Bring a message to the dwarf blacksmith in the mountain forge that his hammer is ready.
Seek out the silent monk near the stone circle and offer him a feather as tribute.
Escort the bard through the market square and protect him from hecklers.
Help the young squire polish the dragon shield before sunset.
Find the magical rune stone hidden beneath the willow by the riverbank.
Convince the town crier to ring the bell of prophecy three times.
Bring the enchanted scroll to the seer in the crystal tent.
Find the dwarf selling fried rats on sticks.
Find the plague doctor to receive a cure if you ate the fried rat on a stick.
Collect a scale from the wyrmling and deliver it to the alchemist's apprentice.
